testsuite.name: test_suites.TS_UI_PMTOOL_04.TC_UI_PMTOOL_04_002
testsuite.system-out: 1. Open Web Application. PMTool home page opens 2. Navigate to Login page and fill the form 3. Verify that the login has been completed 4. Create new project 5. Verify that the project has been created 6. Create new task 7. Verify that the task has been created 8. Edit the created task
